name: Is the Demon Lord's Life Endangered by the Elf Knightess?
name_original: Is the Demon Lord's Life Endangered by the Elf Knightess?
description:
I'm Latina the elf knightess.

You are the Demon Lord, who has begun a battle with humanity to free the rest of your kind.
In your way stands a elf knightess, who has come to defeat you.
What conclusion will result from their battle...?

[Outlines ]
- Become the Demon Lord, and battle Latina the elf knightess with sexy commands.
- Branch off into different sex scenes during the battle,
and depending on your actions, discover 4 different endings.
- The game has two parts. There are two branches from the first battle,
each of which branches into two different endings.

[Features]
- A command-style battle system with active gauges.
Building up your gauge allows you to unleash various skills.
- Clothing / equipment damage is included, even down to gauntlets and socks.
- Receive skill points from battle, and use them to power up, or learn new skills.
- H Skills include time-stopping magic, hypnotizing magic,
clothing destruction techniques, techniques for knockdown, etc.
- Branch off into 4 different endings depending on battles and dialog.
- Each ending includes different sex scenes.
Previously viewed scenes can be viewed anytime!
- H scenes include missionary, doggy, cowgirl, handjob, fellatio, breastfuck, face sitting, etc.
- 30+ scenes including variations
- Strip the heroines at your measure (or not!). Creampie timing is up to you!
Heroine pleasure levels can be changed as well.
- Different creampie animations are included for each position.
- Cross-sections can be toggled ON / OFF

  • Creampie animations can be repeated via the manual mode.
